actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide that the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York shall be held at New York, New York, and White Plains, New York.

summary.text: Provides for holding the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York at White Plains as well as at New York City.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York shall be held at New York, New York, and White Plains, New York.
